Combos on Steroids, for your mechanical keyboard

Combos are a powerful feature, from Alt-Tab on the home row to your favourite snippets almost anything can be done with a programmable keyboard Here youâ€™ll find a collection of user dictionaries, that can be easily layered into your own QMK keymaps taking your ergonomics to a whole new level.

Download some of the avalible dictionaries or start modifying your own!

Some user dictionaries

NameDescriptionAuthorLink
vim-helpersVim-focused combos for easy access to Esc/: and othersgermview

Why?

Keyboards are too big and we need some serious ergonomic reform in our lives.
The less keystrokes needed, the better. Look at 40%~ keyboards, small keyboards
big utility :)
